string-array.name: inspirational_quotes
string-array.item: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." - Lao Tzu
"Nature always wears the colors of the spirit." - Ralph Waldo Emerson
"Adventure awaits at every corner. Go and find it."
"In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks." - John Muir
"The best view comes after the hardest climb."
"Take only memories, leave only footprints." - Chief Seattle
"Let's wander where the Wi-Fi is weak."
"Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt." - John Muir
"Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees." - John Muir
"The mountains are calling, and I must go." - John Muir
"Hiking and happiness go hand in hand or foot in boot." - Diane Spicer
"The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness." - John Muir
"On the top of the mountains and beneath the stars is the journey of your lifetime."
"The best journeys in life are those that answer questions you never thought to ask." - Rick Ridgeway
"Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations."
